channel.title: Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Some info you might wanna look at
channel.description:
I'm sure a lot of you have heard, but maybe you guys know somethings I don't about it, or maybe I know somethings you don't. Lets discuss.
First off, I heard that the max level is 85 and there is 8 prestiges. Sounds like a tough game. I like it.
Second, I've seen a preview of the possible prestige icons here: http://codmodernwarfare2.files.wordpress.com/2009/06/mw2-prestige11.jpg
And that might prove that 8 prestiges isn't true and there is 10. But those badges aren't confirmed.
I also found a video of custom classes being made, you can see the best assault rifle is at level 70, which means 85 levels might be true, or maybe it is 70, or 75 like Cod5. Here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zpaur5XhwJ8
Also a confirmed new perk of Dual weilding with more information here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vVzkl0IY1Kg&feature=related
A game of "Domination" on one of the new maps, also shown the most of "Favela"
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hqRbSSmxIbo&feature=related
Adding more info right now...

item.title: Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Some info you might wanna look at
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“casey., post:22, topic:308431”]It’s way to hyped up already…[/quote]There’s no reason for it not to be, it looks like a great game.

Read full topic

item.title: Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Some info you might wanna look at
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“Tico, post:14, topic:308431”][quote author=Budda link=topic=404878.msg2994500#msg2994500 date=1255482396]

You also play as 2 characters (Like in Cod 4 and 5) “Roach” working with the U.S army and run by “Soap” Mctavish, the guy you played as in Cod4

Many new weapons have been confirmed for MWF2 - Here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BUvso02b8s
and more are still being added too!

Also, there is no more problems with “Host Ended Game” When the host leaves, now it just quickly switches to a new host.

When I find out more I’ll get to you guys

You don’t play as Soap, he is your superior and you play as a new guy.
Fucking research your facts a bit more before you post them.
Everything you need to know is in these links:

Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Goes Past 11, And 69

Infinity Ward revealed some key numbers and details about Modern Warfare 2 on Game Trailers TV last night. Plus they made it clear that at least one part of the game will be tough.


Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Delayed Two Weeks for PC?

Citing unnamed sources, the site Electronic Theatre reports that the PC version of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 will be delayed two weeks past its general Nov. 10 release date to Nov. 24.


Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 "Infamy" Trailer: The War Comes Home

"Infamy," the heavily anticipated Modern Warfare 2 trailer is now live on Infinity Ward's site. In it, a narration of the biblical story of the first murder introduces sequences that depict Washington under seige.


Kotaku

8 Minutes Of Modern Warfare 2 Story Mode

There's no telling where this cam-footage of an entire Modern Warfare 2 mission came from, but there's no mistaking it for any other game.


Kotaku

No Modern Warfare 2 Demo For You

The original Modern Warfare had a hugely popular beta/demo. No doubt helped sell a few million copies of the game. So will Modern Warfare 2 do the same thing? Not. A. Chance.


Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Multiplayer Hands-On Impressions: No Buzzkills

Activision gave us our first taste of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2's multiplayer modes tonight at an event in Hollywood, California, featuring a fully playable—but still beta—version of the impending holiday blockbuster.


Kotaku

New Modern Warfare 2 Clip Debuts Knife Throw Kills, Host Migration

Infinity Ward's latest multiplayer reveal for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 features, according to the developer, "uncut" direct feed Capture The Flag gameplay. Neat, yes, but there are some newish details seen for the first time...


Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Gameplay Leaked from Game Crazy Con

Earlier this week GameCrazy held their annual retailer convention in Las Vegas, getting a chance to check out a slew of upcoming titles... and shoot video of at least one.

[/quote]

I’m sorry, I don’t mean to be rude, but Budda is correct. Please for the love of god do your research before posting a topic informing others.

First off, we don’t know how many players we play as, only that it is more then one. Secondly, the max level is 70, and the max prestige is unknown; so whatever you have heard are rumors.

Since you really haven’t given us an compiled list of what is in the game, I’ll go ahead and quote multiplayer details from http://www.modernwarfare247.com/ :
Perk 1:
Scavenger
Sleight of Hand
Marathon
Bling

Perk 2:
Stopping Power
Lightweight
Hardline
Cold-Blooded

Perk 3:
Commando
Steady Aim
Scrambler

Returning guns include the M4, Mini Uzi, AK47, G3, MP5 (has become the MP5K), P90, RPD, Dragunov (variant), Barret (variant), USP.45, Desert Eagle, W1014, and more.

Like I said, if you want more info, visit http://www.modernwarfare247.com/[/quote]I said there is hints of the max level 85, but I had never heard of the site with that video before, so how was I to know?

Read full topic
item.source: Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Some info you might wanna look at

Wii isn’t made for games like CoD, it’s for little arcade games.
[/quote]

Do you remember Cod 3 for Wii? what a waste of time.[/quote]

Not as bad as its cod 5

You also play as 2 characters (Like in Cod 4 and 5) “Roach” working with the U.S army and run by “Soap” Mctavish, the guy you played as in Cod4

Many new weapons have been confirmed for MWF2 - Here http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5BUvso02b8s
and more are still being added too!

Also, there is no more problems with “Host Ended Game” When the host leaves, now it just quickly switches to a new host.

When I find out more I’ll get to you guys
[/quote]

I hope that works on the WII I am to poor to buy a PS3 or XBox :P[/quote]

It’s only being released on PC, Xbox 360, and the PS3.

Fucking research your facts a bit more before you post them.
Everything you need to know is in these links:

Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Goes Past 11, And 69

Infinity Ward revealed some key numbers and details about Modern Warfare 2 on Game Trailers TV last night. Plus they made it clear that at least one part of the game will be tough.


Kotaku

Modern Warfare 2 Delayed Two Weeks for PC?

Citing unnamed sources, the site Electronic Theatre reports that the PC version of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 will be delayed two weeks past its general Nov. 10 release date to Nov. 24.

Modern Warfare 2 "Infamy" Trailer: The War Comes Home

"Infamy," the heavily anticipated Modern Warfare 2 trailer is now live on Infinity Ward's site. In it, a narration of the biblical story of the first murder introduces sequences that depict Washington under seige.


Kotaku

There's no telling where this cam-footage of an entire Modern Warfare 2 mission came from, but there's no mistaking it for any other game.


Kotaku

No Modern Warfare 2 Demo For You

The original Modern Warfare had a hugely popular beta/demo. No doubt helped sell a few million copies of the game. So will Modern Warfare 2 do the same thing? Not. A. Chance.


Kotaku

Activision gave us our first taste of Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2's multiplayer modes tonight at an event in Hollywood, California, featuring a fully playable—but still beta—version of the impending holiday blockbuster.


Kotaku

New Modern Warfare 2 Clip Debuts Knife Throw Kills, Host Migration

Infinity Ward's latest multiplayer reveal for Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2 features, according to the developer, "uncut" direct feed Capture The Flag gameplay. Neat, yes, but there are some newish details seen for the first time...

Modern Warfare 2 Gameplay Leaked from Game Crazy Con

Earlier this week GameCrazy held their annual retailer convention in Las Vegas, getting a chance to check out a slew of upcoming titles... and shoot video of at least one.

I’m sorry, I don’t mean to be rude, but Budda is correct. Please for the love of god do your research before posting a topic informing others.

First off, we don’t know how many players we play as, only that it is more then one. Secondly, the max level is 70, and the max prestige is unknown; so whatever you have heard are rumors.

Since you really haven’t given us an compiled list of what is in the game, I’ll go ahead and quote multiplayer details from http://www.modernwarfare247.com/ :
Perk 1:
Scavenger

Perk 3:

Returning guns include the M4, Mini Uzi, AK47, G3, MP5 (has become the MP5K), P90, RPD, Dragunov (variant), Barret (variant), USP.45, Desert Eagle, W1014, and more.

item.title: Call of duty: Modern Warfare 2 - Some info you might wanna look at
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

[quote=“raptorjesus, post:3, topic:308431”]There is also evidence of player customization, in some videos released by Activision, you can see Gold watches and things like that.[/quote]Because watch choice really contributes to how much a player wants to buy a war game? I don’t understand how gaming companies can take such a great concept and add features that totally butcher it. Take Skate 2 for example. The whole point of skate was to capture the reality of skateboarding, and skating myself I have to admit Skate was the closest thing there was besides actually skating. When it came to Skate 2, I lost all respect because of how unrealistic the physics were and integration to the actual skate genre.

Does anyone else agree? There’s a point where you stop adding features-- I think some pass it or sit on the fence with it.

Read full topic
